name: Descent of Divinity
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Albedo, equip this card.
After Albedo equips this card, immediately use Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma.
When there is Albedo on the field who has this card equipped, if your side of the field has Solar Isotoma, then your characters' Plunging Attack deals +1 DMG.
(You must have Albedo in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
